text:

text:
When a connected firm is hiring:
- Men use outside options to negotiate higher wages within their current job.
- Women's wages are unaffected.
‚û°Ô∏è The arrival of outside job opportunities widens the gender wage gap.

text: Only ~30% of outside offers are relevant for renegotiation. Adjusting for this, outside job opportunities explain ~half of the within-spell growth rate in the gender gap.
